gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor
Class AnnularCursor

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor.XOR_Cursor3pt
      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor.AnnularCursor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AnnularCursor
extends XOR_Cursor3pt
implements java.io.Serializable

This class implements two Rubberband circle cursors for selecting regions. The annular selection includes the points between the two ellipses drawn.

See Also:
XOR_Cursor3pt, Serialized Form

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics graphics,

This method draws a ring consisting of two circles centered at the same point.

Specified by:
draw in class XOR_Cursor3pt
Parameters:
graphics - The graphics context that the circle will be drawn in.
p1 - Center of ring.
p2 - Radius point of inner circle.
p3 - Radius point of outer circle.

region

public java.awt.Point[] region()
This method returns an array of Points used to define a ring. p[0] = center pt of the ring p[1].x = inner radius p[1].y = outer radius

Returns:
array of Points used to define a ring
